bug.author: holdenKjerland-Nicoletti
bug.summary: Increase mulitrotor speed for MovetoPosition in Unreal Engine
bug.description: I am using the simpleflight drone with Unreal 4.18, and am trying to travel across a very large map. However, if I increase the speed for the MoveToPosition API past 12, I get really bad instability for the drone in the vertical direction. I assume this is because it is switching between moving forward and upward to go faster while not losing altitude, so it seems like I just need to change a setting to give the drone stronger motors. Is there anything I can do to increase the max velocity of the drone for MoveToPosition API in Unreal?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/holdenKjerland-Nicoletti>@holdenKjerland-Nicoletti</denchmark-link> Are you controlling the drone by the keyboard or computer code? If you use code, please share section of setting speed and moving the drone.

Closed due to incompleteness. Please feel free to open a new issue if you still have this problem, and include the following (as requested when opening a bug issue) *Make sure to write all reproduction steps *Include full error message in text form *Search issues for error message before filing an issue *Attach a screenshot if applicable *Include code to run if applicable Thanks!
